amendment.description: Amendment revises language relating to the disclosure of data to provide that the Administrator can delay for a period of at least one day but not to exceed 5 years the unrestricted public disclosure of requested technical data.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to limit to 5 years, upon the request of a private sector entity, the delay of unrestricted technical data under the control or possession of NASA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
